full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** **[Stream 1 - 21401-230009 - Institutional Appliances RFSO - Zone 1](#title) [Volet 1 - 21401-230009 - Appareils institutionnels DOC - Zone 1](#title)**

### Summary

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has issued a Request for Standing Offers (RFSA) for institutional appliances in support of the Federal Institutions under its control. The RFSA is open to all qualified suppliers, and interested parties are invited to submit their responses through the Ariba Discovery platform.

### Registration Information

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4317503849
*   **Reference Number:** WS4317503849-Doc4393930029
*   **Publication Date:** February 25, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** April 19, 2024, by 14:00 EDT

### Description

The CSC requires a range of institutional appliances, including washers, dryers, refrigerators, freezers, ranges, and microwaves, to be purchased on an as-needed basis. Up to 2 Regional Individual Standing Offers (RISOs) will be issued per Zone: one PSIB stream and one non-PSIB stream.

In the event that two Standing Offers are issued for one zone, the PSIB Standing Offer holder will have First Right of Refusal in the issuance of call-ups. Offerors must provide firm unit pricing for two years for all items listed in the Basis of Payment to be considered for the issuance of a Standing Offer for this requirement.

### Contact Information

*   **Name:** Nimuan, Kat (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email:** kat.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Phone:** None
*   **Fax:** None

### Notice URL

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18894760?extsite=MTg4OTQ3NjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Notice Type

*   **Type:** Request for Standing Offer
*   **Language:** English
*   **Subject:** Institutional Appliances RFSO - Zone 1

### Category of Goods and Services

*   **Trade Type:** Basic Yearly Average (BYA)
*   **Category of Goods and Services:** Household and Hospital Equipment

### Trade Agreements
